channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish still being dumped by residents living on the main road, with access from the alleyway, 20th July
item.description:
Household waste is being dumped under the tree from residents living on lower Clapton Road, with access to the alleyway by 1 Powerscroft Road. I note this has previously been reported and is marked as fixed but this is a continued daily problem.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lower Clapton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin left on pavement, 20th July
item.description:
Outside nr.16. It's been 5 days since last collection, and it's 10 days until next one, the bin should be inside the property

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Delme Crescent, Kidbrooke, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wilton estate 28 or 30, 20th July
item.description:
Noise none stop through whole night, young people partying, no adult supervision, every single night the same, alcohol drug use and none stop noise.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Greenwood Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Under weight dog liveing at number 9 Boscobel house, 20th July
item.description:
I live in Boscobel house and at number 9 we have a crackhead and drug addict called Edward Benjamin with a dangerous under weight dog not being feed properly the flat is in very bad condition we need the RSPCA to come and check the dog or take it away

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Royal Oak Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recycling bin bin left on path with rubbish in, 20th July

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Offenham Road, Elmstead, London

item.title: Rubbish all the way along the verge, 20th July
item.description:
I reported this the other day and they said it was fixed! All they did was remove the toys and leave all the rubbish along the verge. It is all the way along the path . As you can see the grass is also so long all rubbish is stuck in there as well. There is mice and rats present at the moment in this area so it needs addressing .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Smarden Drove, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping into nursery & school bins to the point of overflowing and cannot close, 20th July
item.description:
The bin allocated to the nursery is overflowing due to fly tipping from local residents who do not have bins. The bin isn’t closed and a has attracted vermin with excrement all around the bin on the floor where the children enter the nursery

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gaza Street, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken Fence at St Luke’s Cemetery, 20th July
item.description:
Broken Fence at St Luke’s Cemetery alongside footpath (accessed from Magpie Hall Lane), behind the memorial plaque wall. Cemetery is no longer secure after hours

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Magpie Hall Lane, Bromley Common, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 59 Thurlow Park Road SE21 8JP - Lambeth Housing issue, 20th July
item.description:
Historically 59 Thurlow Park Road SE21 8JP has been owned by Lambeth. Assuming this has not changed please forward to Lambeth Housing to note the contractor’s material left behind from about 9 months ago when the front garden wall was rebuilt (as it was falling over) – including half pallet of bricks and white ton bags with one part full of sand. Remove. (I could ask who is managing this project but ….) I do not live in this house and I'm not a Lambeth Housing tenant. Please forward fixmylink.com link for picture.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thurlow Park Road, Tulse Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thames Road, North End, London

item.title: Norwood Road SE27 9DJ number 501 (Stapleto, 20th July
item.description:
